meanings.definition: To operate the pedals of a bicycle or other vehicle too forcefully or excessively.
meanings.sent1: She overpedals on her bike, making it hard to control.
meanings.sent2: He always overpedals when riding his scooter, causing accidents.
meanings.sent3: The little girl overpedals on her tricycle, zooming around the park.
meanings.sent4: The musician overpedals on the piano, creating a chaotic melody.
meanings.sent5: The car driver overpedals, causing the vehicle to jerk forward suddenly.
